case_circumstances:
The decedent is found wrapped and bound inside a mattress that was placed inside a dumspster and set aflame on the premises of a church called Iglesia DeCristo Missionera, 2400 N. Orianna St. Philadelphia, PA.  
The body is severely charred. The case was deemed a homicide. Numerous attempts were made to attain an identity over the years. A comprehensive review of cold case unknowns determined that further investigation is warranted. Fingerprints were processed and produced no record at that time. DNA comparison is available.
case_head_hair: Majority of head hair was burned.dark colored tightly curled approximately 1 inch in length.
fingerprints: No fingerprint information is currently available
case_clothing_on_body: Charred remnants of a brown striped shirt.
dental: Dental information / charting is available and entered
documents: There are currently no documents available for this case.
